Friends

  • CPoint2D< T > operator * (const T &Factor, const CPoint2D &P2D)
    a friend method overloading the * operator, makes it possible to write f*P2D, where f is a factor of type T and P2D is of type CPoint2D<POLY>.

Detailed Description

template<class T>
class CPoint2D< T >

CPoint2D template class with 2-dimensional points, last updated 1/27/2002.

Use this class to manipulate 2-dimensional points. Most operators are overloaded and each member in a point (x,y) can be reached and manipulated through public methods. The position (x,y) can be streamed with the "<<"-operator and read by the ">>"-operator. A corresponding 3-dimensional point class is also available. This class is part of the Image Processing Library IPL98.

See also:
CPoint3D
Version:
1.45, by edr@mip.sdu.dk
Author:
René Dencker Eriksen

Definition at line 351 of file point2d.h.

template<class T>
bool CPoint2D< T >::IsZero (  T    Zero )  const [inline]
 

Returns true, if point is smaller than supplied value, that is both x and y values are less than supplied value.

A method without parameters checking if point is exactly zero is available.

Parameters:
Zero  Value to compare both x and y components with, must be greater than or equal to zero.
Returns :
True, if point is smaller than Zero parameter.
See also:
ZeroAdjust

Definition at line 73 of file point2d.h.

template<class T>
std::istream & CPoint2D< T >::operator<< (  std::istream &    s )  [inline, virtual]
 

Note: This method will be removed in a future version, this is not the correct way of using an istream.

Reads input from given stream, stream must be in correct format according to how the << ostream operator formats output. Both paranteses are removed from stream. Be careful when using this method, it has not been tested with all template types and may change in future versions. Note: Comment lines and whitespace can be put anywhere within the stream.

Version:
0.1

Definition at line 381 of file point2d.h.

References CPoint2D< T >::m_x, and CPoint2D< T >::m_y.

template<class T>
void CPoint2D< T >::Rotate (  double    Rad )  [inline]
 

Rotates this point Rad radians anti clock wise about origo in an image coordinate system, that is with x axis increasing to the right and y axis increasing downwards.

If Rad=n*2PI+r with integer n>=1, a rotation of r radians is performed. If a rotation of PI is needed, the faster method RotatePi can be called.

Parameters:
Rad  Radians to rotate point.
Version:
0.3
See also:
RotatePi

Definition at line 360 of file point2d.h.

References CPoint2D< T >::m_x, and CPoint2D< T >::m_y.

template<class T>
void CPoint2D< T >::RotatePi (    )  [inline]
 

Rotates this point PI radians about origo.

It is a fast version of Rotate since it only requires a sign change of the (x,y) value.

Version:
0.3
See also:
Rotate

used for loading.

Friends And Related Function Documentation

template<class T>
std::istream& operator>> (  std::istream &    is,
CPoint2D< T > &    P2D
)  [friend]
 

Reads input from given stream into this class.

Stream must be in correct format according to how the << ostream operator formats output. Both paranteses are removed from stream. Note: Beacuause of a bug in the Borland C++ 4.0 compiler, the definition of this method is placed in the header file, otherwise the Borland compiler can't link.

Version:
0.2
